text: The disciple wanted to elaborate everything through intellectual understanding. He trusted reason only and was locked in his own logical cage. He went to the spiritual mentor and asked, "Lord, who holds the world?" The mentor replied, "Eight white elephants. - And who holds the eight white elephants? - asked the disciple intrigued. - Eight more white elephants. FIN
title: Ocho elefantes blancos
author: nan Anónimo
